Name: B-10М foregrip and rail mount B-19
Description: Integrally machined B-10M foregrip is manufactured from aluminum alloy D16T with black coating and can be installed instead of the standard-issue foregrip on AK series 103, 104, 105, 74S, 74M, AKM, and AKMS. B-19 rail mount is basically sight support hovering over the gas tube. Also integrally machined from D16T aluminum alloy with black coating, it can be installed on B-10M or B-21M foregrips.©Zenit
